name: DOC_IMG_EDIT_AUDIT_TRAIL
description: Contains the audit trail for image editing.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMAGE_EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant of the image edit.

columns.name: IMAGE_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who edited the image.

columns.name: IMAGE_EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: IMAGE_EDIT_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated with the image edit.

columns.name: IMAGE_EDIT_PREV_BLOB_KEY
columns.description: The previous BLOB key that holds the image prior to the edit.
